name: Numbers Fusion
description:
Notice: Please keep in mind that this is not a clone of 2048, despite the graphic resemblance, it has a totally different gameplay.

Numbers Fusion is a challenging and at the same time a relaxing game, where you can always improve your previous score.

Gameplay

The goal of the game is to fuse neighboring equal numbers into greater numbers, freeing up space on the grid where can be placed more numbers, generating more points.

Drag one of the two numbers below the grid and drop it into an empty cell. If you combine two or more adjacent (horizontal and vertical only) same numbers, the numbers will fuse within the last discarded one. If the value of the resulting fusion is equal to or greater than 128, this number will also disappear, freeing up even more space on the board.

It may seem complicated, but it is very simple, take a look at the video and draw your conclusions :P

Features
• does not require internet connection;
• colorblind friendly game;
• optional online leaderboard to challenge your friends (android only);
• totally free, no in app purchases;
